title: 434: Some Seriously Psychic Sh*t!
itunes:title: 434: Some Seriously Psychic Sh*t!
description:
Today The Broads are joined by the incredible intuitive channel/energy healer/and more - Jessica Stone! She shares about her work, how she got started, how she is connected to both Bekah and Jess - and then Jessica dives into a reading with The Broads that brings out A LOT of emotions and powerful conversations they have been continuing for days after. Thank you so much, Jessica! 

 

JESSICA STONE:

***Follow Jessica on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/jessicastone_co/ 

***Book sessions on her website: https://jessicastoneco.com/ 

***Purchase “The Art of Intuitive Tarot Guidebook and Tarot Deck” here: https://jessicastoneco.com/tarotdeck/the-art-of-intuitive-tarot-guide-book-and-tarot-deck 

***Stay updated about her upcoming Patreon and join her mailing list here: https://view.flodesk.com/pages/62e0776dbf22a55feeba5cc0 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY135 and use code CHATTY135 to get $135 off across five boxes - and your first box ships free! 

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to FRAMEBRIDGE.COM and use promo code CHATTYBROADS to save an additional 15% off your first order!
